articles.title: Pollution, poverty and power: the real cost of environmental inequality in the UK
articles.full_text: Cleaner air is progress, but injustice remains. Environmental racism still decides who breathes dirty air, who gets sick and who gets heard.
articles.summary: Cleaner air is progress, but injustice remains. Environmental racism still decides who breathes dirty air, who gets sick and who gets heard. .
